mapper.insert: insert into visitor_info (vid, name, idnumber, phone, creat_time) values (#{vid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select vid, name, idnumber, phone, creat_time from visitor_info
